description:
As an application user
  I want to log in to OrangeHRM
  So that I can access the dashboard and navigate to recruitment

steps.name: Given  user opens the OrangeHRM application
When  user enters valid username and password
And  user clicks on the login button
Then  dashboard page should be displayed
When  user navigates to Recruitment Candidates page
Then  candidates page header should be displayed
